fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose any player other than yourself, living or dead, to stab to death each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock, Redirect, and Control Immunity
- If you attack a dead player, you will kill them once again, which will show up in the morning announcement and graveyard as usual.
- Each dead player you successfully kill will allow you to use your ability two additional times in the following night.
- You may use attacks in a single night after you die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to eliminate all who would oppose you, or ensure that absolutely every player dies if you die.
